messages.message:
:sparkle:  *Announcement: Important Local Dev + CICD Change!* :sparkle:

:alarm: *DEPRECATION NOTICE (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1k03QjaFCJ9aMJLnLuvdOg-CRORHRafEO4YQQgoeQtDg/edit)*
Effective next Friday, *August 9, 2024 at 17:00 PDT*, we will be deprecating support for personal forks of the primary / 'upstream' `instabase/instabase` repo, ie: all engineers will need to push their branches directly to `instabase/instabase` instead of pushing them to personal forks.

:construction: *What You Need To Do*
1. Refer to this document (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1k03QjaFCJ9aMJLnLuvdOg-CRORHRafEO4YQQgoeQtDg/edit) for instructions and commands that will help you migrate your active branches and re-point any local clones of the repo to the upstream URL.
2. Once you've migrated your clone(s) and any active branches, head over to Sandbox ICC (https://sandbox.console.instabase.com/sandbox) and update any sandboxes you've deployed from *any* personal fork - you need only change the `Fork` field in ICC's UI to `instabase`, then run the update.
:question-block: *Impact*
After the deadline given above:
1. Sandboxes will *not* be buildable / deployable from forked repos.
2. ICC will no longer show the `Fork` field when creating or updating a stack.
3. We will begin removing all occurrences of `INSTABASE_FORK` or similar parameters from *all* pipelines, on `master` and all `release-.*` branches.
4. All branches being pushed to `instabase/instabase` will need to be uniquely named; I strongly recommend developing a habit of prepending your branch names with a Jira ticket ID, for example `releng-740`, at a minimum.
:boom: *Something goes wrong?*
As always, please jump on over <#C035SLYCJ9X|> with any questions, concerns, or issues you might run into during migration or post-deprecation!
[Note: DMs will not be answered, and will instead be redirected to the team channel so that we can maintain transparency and knowledge-sharing!]
